story_26_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
We’re down to the last few battles in the PML.
Next up are the quarterfinals.
story_26_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
And our opponent is Cynthia, the Champion
of Sinnoh...
story_26_01000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Cynthia is really strong! She practically mopped
the floor with Team Break at one of their hideouts
all by herself!
story_26_01000/2401_1001_0400_10: I can’t wait to battle her!
story_26_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Don’t get me wrong. I’m excited to battle
her, too...
story_26_01000/2401_1001_0600_10:
I just can’t help feeling a little anxious about our
chances. This is THE Cynthia, after all...
story_26_01000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Oh? You two have very different expressions on
your faces even though you’re talking about the
same person. How fascinating!
story_26_01000/2401_1001_0900_10:
V-Viola! Don’t take my picture when I look this
worried! It’s embarrassing!
story_26_01000/2401_1001_1000_10:
What about you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Are you excited? Or are you a little worried, too?
story_26_01000/2401_0401_1200_10: Right? I’m so ready for this battle!
story_26_01000/2401_0401_1300_10: That’s some great energy you two have.
story_26_01000/2401_0401_1400_10:
But I do understand why Rosa is anxious. We’ll
need to come up with a solid plan if we want to
beat Cynthia!
story_26_01000/2401_0402_1600_10:
Right? We’ve had plenty of chances to see for
ourselves just how strong Cynthia is...
story_26_01000/2401_0402_1700_10:
Come on, Rosa and [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Don’t look so down!
story_26_01000/2401_0402_1800_10:
Hau’s right. Let’s think positive! We’ll look better
in pictures if we keep smiles on our faces!
story_26_01000/2401_0402_1900_10:
Besides, if you’re anxious about battling Cynthia,
we should come up with a solid plan to beat her!
story_26_01000/2401_1001_2200_10:
I know! What if we battle against a bunch of
strong sync pairs? That should give us experience
and build up our confidence, don’t you think?
story_26_01000/2401_1001_2400_10:
Wait, the quarterfinals are tomorrow! We don’t
have much time to prepare...
story_26_01000/2401_1001_2500_10:
Can we really find a bunch of strong sync pairs in
such a short amount of time?
story_26_01000/2401_1001_2600_10: Oh? Who do we have here?
story_26_01000/2401_1001_2900_10:
Alola! I see you’re as energetic as ever
today, Hau.
story_26_01000/2401_1001_3000_10:
Hmm. Rosa, on the other hand, looks quite
préoccupée about something. What’s wrong, dear?
story_26_01000/2401_1001_3300_10:
So you want to battle as many sync pairs as
possible in the short time before your match with
Cynthia’s team?
story_26_01000/2401_1001_3400_10:
Yeah. But I guess that’s not a very practical plan,
is it?
story_26_01000/2401_1001_3600_10:
But don’t worry, gute Kinder! I have a great idea
that might be just what the professor ordered!
story_26_01000/2401_1001_3800_10:
Yes! We’ll just need a little help from some
special someones!
story_26_01000/2401_1001_3900_10:
Now, without further ado, let’s vámonos to
my lab!
